name: Robots Runner
summary:
Description Run with your robot into a dark abandoned factory! But beware an infinite path of dangers, put your personal best! avoid the enemies and not fall from the platform if you will not immediately end your adventure.
Your robot is able to jump the platforms with incredible leaps but is also equipped with a "G" device capable of reversing gravity! you find yourself running upside down! use this trick to avoid the big obstacles you encounter on your ride.
